text:
Iâ€™m as close to the hunt/ As I'll ever feel.

/ I sprint with a thrill/ In the space behind my eyes,

/ Someone's heart beats me/ Into the chase.

/ Light falls faster/ Than my footsteps/ Fly.

/ Half-shades glimmer in gold./ My eyes cannot reach them all.

/ And the birds!

/ Watch them far/ Above -/ The birds are almost home!/
